title: Construction of Ba-doped Ag<sub>3</sub>PO<sub>4</sub>/SnO<sub>2</sub> type-II nanocomposites as a promising photocatalyst for boosting photocatalytic degradation of BY28 dye and redox conversion of Cr(VI)/Cr(III)
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19
